string.text:
Dosimeter in Anomaly can work in two modes:
1) Body radiation - shows how much radiation you have.
) Environmnet radiation - show radiation level around player.
If simple mode activated pressing left mouse button while holding dosimeter in hands will toggle between those two modes.

Due to the butchering of this mod, it is a must to keep simple mode ON.
 The original complete mod is DAR Dosimeter Enhanced, by Lizardman.
